models.name: minimal_todo_todos
models.description: Core Todo entity representing individual todo items in the minimal todo application. Stores basic todo information including text content, completion status, and timestamps for tracking creation and updates. As the primary business entity, this table supports all basic CRUD operations for todo management. Enhanced with soft delete support and improved indexing for better performance.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Text content of the todo item. Contains the actual task description that users manage. Should be validated for length (1-500 characters) at the application level.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Completion status indicating whether the todo item has been marked as done. False means incomplete/pending, true means completed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was originally created. Automatically set when the todo is first saved. Used for chronological ordering of todos.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was last modified. Updated automatically whenever any field changes. Used for tracking recent activity.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was soft deleted. Null indicates the todo is active, non-null indicates deletion. Supports the confirmation-based deletion workflow required by business rules.
